summary: REQ-32 and REQ-33 appear to be implemented: `useGetCallerUserProfile` now starts an actor-init timeout whenever `actor` is null (independent of `actorFetching`) and enables the profile query after timeout to reach an error terminal state; `App.tsx` adds an authenticated-user bootstrap watchdog that shows `BootstrapErrorScreen` after a fixed duration with retry/logout actions that invalidate the actor query and refetch the profile.
